name.baseName: Remediated soil ; Soil ex-situ remediation ; Ex-situ thermal desorption
修复后土壤;土壤异位修复;异位热脱附

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: During the soil excavation process, contaminated groundwater will be collected and disposed of in the form of foundation pit wastewater.
土壤挖掘过程，受污染地下水会以基坑废水的形式被收集处置。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit of life cycle assessment is defined as the disposal of foundation pit wastewater generated during the excavation process of 1000m3 contaminated soil, in order to achieve risk-based remediation goals.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: A contaminated site located in Wuhan, China was selected as the case study. Approximately 1.25 million m3 of soil was found contaminated, and forty types of VOCs, SVOCs, and heavy metal contaminants were measured in the soil.
选择位于中国武汉的一个受污染场地作为案例研究。大约125万m3的土壤被受到污染，土壤中测量到40种VOC、SVOC和重金属污染物。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: When the contaminated soil was excavated, wastewater (e.g., contaminated groundwater) generated as the by-product also needed treatment (e.g., flocculation sedimentation, chemical redox, and coagulation).
当挖掘受污染的土壤时，作为副产品产生的废水（如受污染的地下水）也需要处理（如絮凝沉淀、化学氧化还原和混凝）。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set represents the process of ex-situ thermal desorption used for soil remediation at a contaminated site in Wuhan, China. The soil at this site was contaminated with a mixture of VOCs, SVOCs, and heavy metals, and approximately 1.25 million cubic meters of soil required treatment. Soil remediation processes, such as the described ex-situ method, are generally applied to industrial and hazard-critical areas where soil quality must meet certain safety and environmental standards. The treatment of by-product wastewater, including contaminated groundwater generated during excavation, is typically necessary and involves techniques such as flocculation, sedimentation, chemical redox, and coagulation.
该数据集代表了位于中国武汉的受污染场地采用的土壤异位热脱附修复过程。该场地的土壤被VOC、SVOC和重金属混合物污染，大约有125万立方米的土壤需要处理。诸如所述异位方法的土壤修复过程通常应用于工业和危险性关键区域，其中土壤质量必须符合某些安全和环境标准。在开挖过程中产生的副产品废水（包括受污染地下水）通常需要处理，涉及的技术包括絮凝、沉淀、化学氧化还原和混凝。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Guangji H ,Huan L ,Chang C , et al. Selection of green remediation alternatives for chemical industrial sites: An integrated life cycle assessment and fuzzy synthetic evaluation approach. Science of the Total Environment, 2022, 845 157211-157211.

Guangji H ,Huan L ,Chang C , et al. Selection of green remediation alternatives for chemical industrial sites: An integrated life cycle assessment and fuzzy synthetic evaluation approach. Science of the Total Environment, 2022, 845 157211-157211.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data set should model the full soil remediation process for a functional unit of 1000 cubic meters of contaminated soil, along with the associated disposal of foundation pit wastewater generated during the excavation process. It is important to note that the data only covers the operational phase of site remediation, without considering the impacts from the manufacturing of remediation equipment. Users should include remediation goals based on risk assessment criteria and consider the local environmental regulations and standards when applying this data set to broader life cycle assessments.
该数据集的用户应为1000立方米受污染土壤模拟完整的土壤修复过程，以及挖掘过程中产生的基坑废水的处置。值得注意的是，数据仅覆盖现场修复操作阶段，未考虑修复设备制造的影响。用户在将此数据集应用于更广泛的生命周期评估时，应包含基于风险评估标准的修复目标，并考虑当地环境法规和标准。

completeness.common:other: Only impacts from the operational phase of site remediation were assessed, while impacts from the manufacturing of equipment were not considered in the LCA.
仅评估了现场修复操作阶段的影响，而LCA中未考虑设备制造的影响。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
